html:
6.8.20  1:35 pm   How do you keep on track and not get discouraged from learning/working?

      visions of what's possible keep visiting me like an electric shock, at all all hours and moments of the day

6.8.20  1:01 pm   do you think that birds really exist?

      at least one of them does

6.8.20  12:43 pm   hey! i have a question that i've always wondered about you personally, but have been afraid it would come off as rude, so i hope it doesn't. have you ever thought about making videos talking about yourself as a person, going through some of your creative processes, ect., maybe even in a QnA format? only wondering because i love your work, and i think videos that are more "personal" would be very interesting.

      i think there is another section of this website that i think you may enjoy, well 2 sections actually. this questions section, and another section

6.8.20  12:25 pm   As an extremely unmotivated person, what is a good way to get motivated and stay motivated?

      motivated to ____________

6.8.20  12:01 pm   What is the legitamite complexity of the known universe?

      10 out of 10

6.8.20  11:56 am   will you ever release an album?

      i would prefer to release a long seemingly never ending series of songs individually

6.8.20  11:54 am   strait to the point i know you like straight to the point sometimes so what are you working on.

      a whole new method of video production

6.8.20  11:49 am   Do you have a partnership with the geese?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.8.20  11:39 am   Are the timestamps on the questions when they were asked or answered?

     asked

      If it's when they were answered, how are you able to answer so many questions at so many times of day, and do you ever sleep?

6.8.20  11:24 am   how did you become the wise sage that you are now?

      learned all the months

6.8.20  11:22 am   Thoughts on philosophy 

      i'll have to think about that

6.8.20  10:25 am   does australia exist

      yes, that is their signature move

6.8.20  10:22 am   Do you think it could be possible for a machine to generate a random number?

      even better, it can be possible for a random number to generate a machine

6.8.20  10:13 am   What is *ART* ?

      one of the many forms of science

6.8.20  10:10 am   how do you feel about predicting the future in some of your videos?

      the key to predicting the future is reflecting what the present and past remind you of. and then, this is the key that makes everything fall into place, massively cherry pick the results

6.8.20  10:02 am   bill help I asked a question months ago but forgot until now and I don't remember what it was and I don't remember when and now my lil question's lost somewhere in here

      was it this one

6.8.20  9:49 am   help, whenever I "come up with" a song, it turns out to have been just a variation on (a) song(s) that already exist(s).
I know this is true for all songs to some extent, but in my case it reaches plagiarism levels.
is there anything I can do other than trying again 1000000 more times?

      sure, or take a quick break and listen to 1000000 more songs. so many that you accidentally start combining together. it you combine enough songs together i'm pretty sure it's legal. if you get busted then that means you just didn't combine enough songs together

6.8.20  9:47 am   Why do i exist?

      to show others how it can be done

6.8.20  9:23 am   opinion on drawing

      it's pretty good

6.8.20  8:43 am   have you been working on any more "reality" videos? it seems you have made reality videos up to the point where you were starting hotewig

      i did some while testing new video techniques, but it's kind of awkward because it was for 2016 so i'm talking about 'what if i could do a 3D globe.... is that even possible?' and yet clearly the graphics being used to depict the conversation are well beyond that, so, ..... i may have to dial it back a bit there

6.8.20  8:34 am   is the world flat?

      no but scientists are studying ways to make it flat

6.8.20  8:09 am   If you're busy planning when the next 100 videos come out, when will the 101st video come out?

      right after the 100th

6.8.20  7:22 am   Opinion on bread?

      it was the best thing prior to sliced bread

6.8.20  6:57 am   Are piano joke funny?

      the joke is that it's too easy. all the notes are right there in order

6.8.20  6:07 am   Your music really helps me get through the day and i wanted to thank you for that.

      hark, it's a message of friendliness amid courteous pleasantries, tapping uponst the windows

6.8.20  5:24 am   Why are turtles? 

      to push the bounds of speed and quickness to the next level

6.8.20  5:24 am   what are you inventing ?

      video

6.8.20  5:22 am   How do I use my creativity and combine all the things I love in just one package as you seem to be doing?

      first see if you can decide on a name, (in some cases you may realize you already have one). this will help create sort of a common umbrella for everything to be under

6.8.20  5:05 am   How long is your next video?

      possibly a more normal and regular length of video than you could ever dream of

6.8.20  4:50 am   have you dealt with anxiety before? if you do how do you deal with it and stop it interfering with your work?

     with some simple conversion tactics you can actually put it into your work

      mine feels like its getting to a life ruining point and i'm not sure what to do as i don't really have access to a therapist or anything.

     everyone is therapists, but it might be even better to become one. that way you can experience the therapy first hand

     ps i love u as always ur music has inspired me so much<3

     holy geological feature, do i detect a seismographic tremor of friendliness

6.8.20  4:41 am   Opinion on over-rated content?

      that's your opinion, but you conveniently did not tell me which content, thereby making it impossible for me to have any opinion

6.8.20  4:33 am   Why did they closed down the mall ?

      disease

6.8.20  4:08 am   you're The Last of the Great Artists,

     well then how do you explain all the previous people who were called that

      and i hope you spawn legions of imitators and innovators

     i will see what i can do

6.8.20  3:15 am   why do you think there are so many gods in India

      the legal system in India is very favorable to gods

6.8.20  3:15 am   Which map projection is your favorite

     sphere

      and why?

     so real

6.8.20  3:05 am   what is your musical taste,

     reasonable, sensible

     and does it differ much from your own music?

      not if i can help it

6.8.20  3:02 am   What is music?

      the secret ingredient to almost all media

6.8.20  2:53 am   whats the next big thing

      huge things

6.8.20  2:52 am   Can microwaves make music?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.8.20  2:12 am   Why are you French?
Don't lie to me. I know you're French. YOU'RE EXPOSED. 

      oh yea well if i'm french then why can't i find marcheaux on this map

6.8.20  2:04 am   Why is it so dark outside 

      i blame the clock or calendar

6.8.20  1:53 am   Hello Bill Wurtz, You are an amazing song writer and bring my joy up alot, but what will your next song be about? No rush, but I would like to know!

      i think it's safe to say that it will be about real life

6.8.20  1:52 am   what is the best language in your opinion?

      time/space

6.8.20  1:52 am   You truly has a big brain

      put it this way......... it's not as big as my chair

6.8.20  1:50 am   What is most important, talent or hard work?

      what about hard talent

6.8.20  1:43 am   any advice for having stronger self discipline? i admire your ability to put your all into what you do and work on tight schedules, i would like to take inspiration from your work ethic but i find myself getting distracted very easily or not being able to conjure up the willpower to work when i need to. it is quite frustrating, most of my time creating things happens in short uncontrolled bursts scattered between long stretches of procrastination. im curious if you have any wisdom in regards to this

      great schedules are usually formed immediately after moments where it seems like you've hit rock bottom

6.8.20  1:37 am   what should i do on my first day of school?

      figure out which school it is

6.8.20  1:18 am   Any advice on dealing with irrational feelings/paranoia?

      write some fictional tales and situations

6.8.20  1:17 am   What is humanity?

      could be you

6.8.20  1:13 am   thoughts on science fiction?

      seems legit
